name: mobile-app-showcase
title: Mobile App Showcase
desc: A customizable Astro theme to showcase your mobile app.
article: This theme is a fully responsive and customizable landing page for showcasing your mobile app. It utilizes simple HTML and CSS for design and layout, ensuring simplicity and speed. Ideal for developers and designers looking for a lightweight starting point to promote their app. Other than Astro, this theme ships with no external dependencies!

github.name: app-showcase
github.description: A customizable Astro theme to showcase your mobile app.
